Function.Description: The substringFill function replaces each character in a specified substring withing a String with the specified sill character.

Brief.Overview: The substringFill function replaces each character in a specified substring {start end} within a String {string} with the specified fill character {fill}.
Brief.Usage: Use the substringFill function to populate a substring with a pattern String.

Syntax.Expression:
(substringFill string start end fill)

(substringFill text start end fill)
Syntax.Return: Returns true if the comparison is true, false if the comparison is false
